params.adminManager: Address of the adminManager contract of the escrow platform.
params.client: Address of the client initiating actions within the escrow.

transferClientOwnership(address).details: Can only be called by the account recovery module registered in the system.

params.newOwner: The address to which the client ownership will be transferred.

params.contractId: The identifier of the contract for which contractor ownership is being transferred.
params.milestoneId: The identifier of the milestone for which contractor ownership is being transferred.
params.newOwner: The address to which the contractor ownership will be transferred.

transferClientOwnership(address).notice: Transfers ownership of the client account to a new account.

transferContractorOwnership(uint256,uint.notice: Interface declaration for transferring contractor ownership.

documentation.text: @notice Error for when no deposits are provided in a function call that expects at least one.

@notice Error for when too many deposit entries are provided, exceeding the allowed limit for a single
 transaction.
@notice Error for when an invalid contract ID is provided to a function expecting a valid existing contract ID.

@notice Error for when an invalid milestone ID is provided to a function expecting a valid existing milestone
 ID.
@notice Error for when the provided milestone limit is zero or exceeds the maximum allowed.

@notice Emitted when the maximum number of milestones per transaction is updated.
 @param maxMilestones The new maximum number of milestones that can be processed in a single transaction.
